title: An amount of Rs
clause_text: An amount of Rs.5000/- per sq. m shall be paid by the landlord/s or Co-operative Housing Societies of existing tenants, as additional development cess for the built-up area over and above the F.S.I. permissible as per table 12 under Regulation 30, for the rehabilitation and free sale components. This amount shall be paid to the Municipal Corporation in accordance with the time schedule for such payment as may be laid down by the Municipal Commissioner, MCGM, provided the payment of instalments shall not go beyond the completion of construction. This amount shall be used for Scheme to be prepared for the improvement of off-site infrastructure in the area around the development. The above development cess shall be enhanced @ 10% every three years.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
